title: Chain
desc:
- ⛓️ cards may be played on or off any color except <:holy:1120560132150022184> <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551> <:partisan:1107460550268559380> <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> <:wild:1106237191388143838>.
- All ⛓️ color effects have a Trigger. Until that Trigger is met, only ⛓️ colored cards may be played. Ignore the Trigger of any ⛓️ colored cards played on ⛓️ colored cards.
